description: Wild Tiger as seen when sponsored by Apollon Media, wearing his new ultra resistant high tech suit. This Hero has the NEXT power "Hundred Power", which boosts his physical abilities by 100 times for five minutes (requiring an hour to recharge afterwards). He is best known for his strong punching. He is the partner of the Hero Barnaby and his catchphrase is "It`s time to let out a wild roar!".
name: Wild Tiger
